mapper.select: select brd.partici_memb_uni_no, brd.brd_uni_no, brd.board_nm, brd.pubc_yn, brd.reg_dt, brd.prj_uni_no, brd_bm.brd_yn from brd left outer join brd_bm on brd.brd_uni_no = brd_bm.brd_uni_no left outer join brd_cm on brd.brd_uni_no = brd_cm.board_uni_no where brd.prj_uni_no=#{prjUniNo} and (brd.pubc_yn = 'Y' or (brd.pubc_yn='N' and brd_cm.partici_memb_uni_no=#{particiMembUniNo}))
SELECT * FROM prj_partici_memb WHERE prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo} AND partici_memb_uni_no NOT IN (SELECT partici_memb_uni_no FROM brd_cm WHERE board_uni_no = #{brdUniNo})
